title: Effects of multifunctional cerium-doped carbon dots on photosynthetic capacity and nutritional quality of lettuce
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00374H, Paper
Shili Zhao, Chen Li, Caijuan Wu, Juan Hu, Zhiwei Zhang, Bingfu Lei, Wei Li, Chaofan Hu, Yingliang Liu, Mingtao Zheng
Cerium-doped carbon dots (Ce-CDs) have been prepared using a one-pot hydrothermal method and employed as a foliar fertilizer, which can improve the nutritional quality of lettuce, and promote the photosynthetic capacity of plants.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
